His economic activity is providing welding services, general lathe services and manufacturing spare parts for automobiles and industrial machinery.  He’s had this business for 20 years and it’s his source of income to support his family.  He’s asking for a 28,000 lempira loan to buy materials like iron, tin, steel and others.  He’ll buy them in large amounts because he saves money that way.  It will also help him fill orders and provide better service.  His goal is to update his machinery to do better work and that his shop is managed by his family.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
Edwin tiene 42 años, está casado y tiene dos hijos. La casa donde viven ahora la heredó de sus padres hace 30 años.
Hace 2 años comenzó en el negocio de la compra y venta de fruta, él mismo trasporta las grandes cargas de fruta de los distribuidores a juguerias y fuentes de soda en la ciudad capital. Confiesa que con en la papaya obtiene más ganancias, ya que es la fruta que más se consume. Su negocio le es rentable, pues no tiene mucha competencia y ahora comenzará la temporada de cítricos por lo que quiere estar en condiciones para satisfacer la demanda.  

Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Estrellitas” y este es su cuarto crédito con MFP. En todo este tiempo obtuvo beneficios en su negocio con estos préstamos, pues aprendió a invertir y obtener ganancias gracias a su grupo, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. 
Edwin invertirá este dinero en la compra de millares de kilos de frutas de temporada (cítricos) para repartir en la capital.
texts.en:
Edwin is 42 years old, is married, and has two children.  He inherited his house from his parents 30 years ago.  Two years ago he started a business buying and selling fruit.  He transports the fruit himself, delivering large quantities from the distributors to factories that make juices and sodas in the capital city.

He reports that he makes the most income from papayas, since this is the fruit that is consumed the most.  His business is profitable, since he does not have a lot of competition.  Citrus fruits are now coming into season, so he wants to be in a position to meet his customers' needs.

He belongs to the supportive group“Estrellitas”, and this is his fourth loan with MFP.  In all this time his business has benefited from these loans.   He has learned to invest and make profits thanks to his group.  He promises to be punctual in repaying his loan.

Edwin will use the loan proceeds to buy thousands of kilograms of seasonal citrus fruits to distribute in the capital.

loans.use: to buy thousands of kilograms of seasonal citrus fruits to distribute in the capital.

loans.name: Ana Claribel

texts.es:
Ana, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio, pues ella depende económicamente de esta actividad, por eso cree necesario la inversión para comprarse nuevos estilos en blusas, ropa interior, faldas, ya que le permitirá ofrecer a los clientes una mayor variedad.

Con el préstamo anterior considera haber tenido una buena experiencia, ya que también logró realizar una buena inversión en prendas con nuevos estilos, su situación económica considera que está cambiando ya que actualmente vive en una condición más favorable.
texts.en:
Ana decided to request a new loan to invest in her business, because she is economically dependent on this activity. She thinks the investment is necessary to buy blouses, underwear and skirts in new styles. This will allow her to offer more variety to her customers. 

She had a good experience with the previous loan, because she managed to make a good investment in clothes with new styles. She believes her economic situation is changing and she now lives in a more favorable situation.

loans.use: to buy blouses, underwear and skirts.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime es un hombre trabajador, es padre de 2 hijos a los cuales quiere mucho y apoya con lo que puede ya que hace algunos años quedo viudo, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la ciudad de Pucallpa se encuentra en la selva peruana, esta ciudad alberga flora y fauna muy bella, es un lugar donde uno puede apreciar lo hermoso de la naturaleza y sobre todo relajarse. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la Sarapatera, el cual es un plato típico de la zona. El solo puedo estudiar hasta el segundo grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Mecánica Automotriz.

Con mucho entusiasmo Jaime trabaja en su negocio de venta de raspadillas y refrescos, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes, también trabaja como chofer de mototaxi sobre todo cuando hay clientes que no tienen como movilizarse;  él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes.

Jaime está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le dan su gran apoyo, y ahora podrá comprar una maquina raspadillera, con lo cual dará una mejor atención a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos  así el podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener para la venta de pescado y sal”.
texts.en:
Jaime’s a hardworking man and father of two children who he loves very much and supports any way he can since he was widowed several years ago. 
His home is located in the city of Pucallpa.  The city of Pucallpa is located in the Peruvian jungle and it houses very beautiful flora and fauna.  It is a place where one can admire nature and above all relax.  When he has free time available he likes eating one of his favorite dishes which is “Sarapatera,” [turtle soup] a dish that’s typical of the region.  He was only able to study up to second grade but would have like to have studied auto mechanics.

With much effort Jaime works in his business selling shaved ice and soft-drinks.  He works about 10 hours daily and can tend to up to 30 customers.  He also works as a mototaxi driver above all when there are customers who don’t have a way of getting around.  He believes that he does well in his business because he’s very kind to customers.

Jaime is very grateful to Kiva lenders because this is the second time they give him their support and now he’ll be able to buy a shaved ice making machine that will let him provide better customer service and improve his income to continue working toward his greatest dream: to earn enough to sell fish and salt.

loans.use: to buy a shaved ice making machine.

loans.name: Jose Bitelio

texts.es:
José, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poderlo invertir en su negocio, comprándose cerdos pequeños, para poder mantenerlos en la granja y engordarlos para el comercio, esta compra le ayudará para ganar un margen de ingresos por la venta a futuro.

El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue favorable, pues le permitió tener buenos ingresos, que hasta el momento le han servido para mantener una condición económica más estable con su familia y al mismo tiempo cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en: José’s asking for a new loan to invest in his business.  He will buy piglets to raise in his farm and fatten up to sell.  This purchase will help him obtain a margin of income from the subsequent sale.  His previous loan had a positive effect in that it made it possible for him to earn good income which to date has maintained his family’s economic condition stable while also covering household expenses.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 50 rolls of lace material @ Le 100,000.

loans.name: Tuzamurane / Rng 2 Group

texts.fr:
Ancile fait partie du groupe Tuzamurane / Rng 2. Le nom du groupe signifie «se soutenir l’un à l’autre». Il a 34 ans, il est marie avec 5 enfants de 8 ans à 17 ans. Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 ans de primaire.

Ancile est agriculteur de manioc. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Pour faire croitre son agriculture de manioc, il planifie de louer d’autres champs pour augmenter l’agriculture de manioc. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait être le grand distributeur des maniocs dans la région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire de ses enfants et construire une belle maison pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Ancile is part of the group Tuzamurane / Rng 2. The group's name means "Support One Another". He is 34 years old and married, and he has five children, from 8 to 17 years old. He has a 5th grade education. 

Ancile is a cassava farmer. This loan cycle is his first one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy chemical fertilizer and to pay for labor. 

To expand his cassava farming, he plans to lease other fields to increase his farming. In the next few years, he would like to be the region's big distributor of cassava. With the profits, he plans on covering the cost of his children's schooling and building a nice house for his family.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and pay workers

loans.name: Zoila Emperatriz

texts.es:
Soila, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para poder continuar trabajando y mejorando el negocio y la atención a su clientela, invertirá con este nuevo financiamiento en la compra de productos para el negocio como frijoles, azúcar, gaseosas, plátanos, tomates, repollo, boquitas, pan, cebollas y aceite, éstos son algunos de los materiales y productos que comprara con este dinero por considerar que son necesarios para las ventas.

Con el préstamo anterior logró tener una buena inversión en el negocio y aumentar la disponibilidad de productos, hasta el momento ha logrado que su negocio sea estable y que sus clientes mantengan su preferencia, hasta el momento no han cambiado sus situaciones en la familia sigue estable.
texts.en:
Zoila has decided on a new loan to continue working and improving the business and customer care.  She will invest this new loan in the purchase of products for the store like beans, sugar, soft-drinks, bananas, tomatoes, cabbage, snacks, bread, onions and oil.  These are some of the materials and products she will buy with this money because she considers them necessary for the sales.

She got good results from the previous business loan in that availability of products increased.  To date she’s managed to keep the business stable and retain her customers’ preference.  Her family situation is also stable; there have been no changes to date.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.es:
Mercedes, se ha decidido por un préstamo por la necesidad de continuar invirtiendo más en el comercio de ropa, invertirá los fondos prestados en la compra de ropa interior para damas y caballeros, ropa para niños, blusas y faldas para adultos, entre otra mercadería que es necesaria y que también considera que le traerá ganancias.

Con el préstamo anterior ha logrado permanecer en el negocio, manteniéndonos un surtido en prendas de vestir, sus ingresos han estado aumentando, para las diferentes circunstancias en la familia pues manifiesta haber tenido una mejor solvencia para cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Mercedes has decided on a new loan because she needs to continue investing more in her clothing business.  She will invest the loan money in the purchase of underwear for women and men, children’s clothes and  blouses and skirts for adults, among other merchandise that’s necessary and that she considers will produce profits.

With her previous loan she managed to stay in business keeping it stocked with clothes.  Her income has been increasing for the various family circumstances and she states that she’s been better able financially to cover her needs.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ten's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager from Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Ten is a 28-year-old father of one dependent son. He and his wife make a living via rice farming on one hectare of farmland and cassava planting on two hectares of land. For 10 years involved in this business, he can earn about 29,000 KHR on average per day. For him, the declining price of cassava is the main challenge. 

Ten took his first loan with VisionFund in 2011 and completely paid it back. The past loan has made a good progress of his living conditions and maintained his business progressively. Now, he joins a group of two members to seek a new loan with VisionFund, Kiva's partner. He will use his portion in the amount of 1,000,000 KHR, which is the same amount as his co-member, to pay for weeding for his cassava field. He expects to gain more crop yield so as to better his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To pay for weeding costs

loans.name: Jeanylyn

texts.en: Jeanylyn, aged 36, is operating a business buying and selling, particularly bananas. Her problem is that she hasn’t enough funds to maximize her business. For this reason she is seeking a loan amount of PHP 10,000 to buy bananas as well as vegetables so she can meet her customers’ orders. With this loan she hopes to increase her income and the number of her customers. She always hopes to offer the best products to her customers because this is a great way to promote their loyalty. So Jeanylyn hopes you will grant her requested loan.

loans.use: to buy bananas as well as vegetables

loans.name: Leangkhim

texts.en:
Leangkhim is a young breadwinner of the family and also a mother of a 2-year-old boy. To support the entire household, she and her husband have been growing garlic for three years. The current business earns them about 7 US dollars per day. Leangkhim has been with VisionFund for four cycles and completely paid back the entire loan. The past four loans have helped her to maintain her current business, have decent food daily, and set aside some money to buy cows. She feels confident that she will improve her lifestyle gradually. 

Now, she is applying for a new loan as a fifth loan cycle client. She is going to use her loan to purchase more garlic for growing, and a portion of it will be added to her money that she has saved up to buy one more cow. She hopes to double her income via her crop yield in order to better her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy garlic for growing and to buy a cow

loans.name: Sinoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Sinoeurn, age 30, is a rural villager in the Kror Kor district of Pursat province. She is a rice farmer. She has two children, both of whom are enrolled in grade one at the local public school. She earns her income by farming rice on two hectares of farmland. She has been engaged in this work for several years and can earn about 7,000 KHR per day. 

Sinoeurn is the leader of a group consisting of three female members, all of whom are their fourth loan cycle clients with VisionFund, a Kiva partner. Sinoeurn has repaid her previous loans and has used the loan funds to to buy piglets for raising, which has brought her additional income. She and one other group member are now seeking a new loan of 500,000 KHR each, while the third member is applying for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KHR. 

Sinoeurn will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland as well as to buy chickens to raise, which will add to her profits. She hopes to gain greater crop yields so that she can continue to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for farmland and to buy chickens to raise

loans.name: María Esthela

texts.es:
María tiene 32 años, es una mujer bastante sociable y es muy responsable en su trabajo para salir adelante con su familia. María vive con sus 4 hijos en Atuntaqui que se encuentra cerca de Ibarra.

María trabaja sola en la crianza de cuyes para la venta, trabaja ya en este negocio por 5 años y constantemente gracias a los préstamos ha ido creciendo lo que le ayuda a mantener a sus hijos ya que es su única fuente de ingresos económicos. María necesita ampliar el galpon para incrementar sus animales y usará este crédito que solicita a Fodemi para adecuar el galpon de cuyes, para la compra de alimentación como balanceado y en la compra de 50 cuyes de raza para reproducción. Con esta inversión María podrá tener un mayor número de cuyes y aumentarán sus ventas e ingresos.

María sueña en mejorar su calidad de vida y que su negocio sea una empresa familiar y poder distribuir a empresas grandes.
texts.en:
María is thirty-two years old and quite a social woman. She is very responsible with her work in order to get her family ahead and lives with her four children in Atuntaqui which is located near Ibarra.

María works alone raising guinea pigs to sell. She's worked in this business for 5 years already, and thanks to the loans has gone on growing constantly, which allows her to support her children as it's her only source of income. María needs to expand the shed to increase her number of animals. She will use the loan she's requesting from Fodemi to adjust the guinea pigs' shed, buy animal feed, and purchase fifty pedigree guinea pigs for reproduction. With this investment María will be able to have a greater number of guinea pigs and will increase her sales and earnings.

María dreams of improving her quality of life and also that her business will be a family company and able to distribute to large companies.

loans.use: to adapt the guinea pigs' shed, to buy animal feed, and to purchase fifty pedigree guinea pigs for reproduction.

loans.name: Veronica Del Carmen

texts.es:
Verónica, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, porque su inventario en ropa está disminuyendo, ella cree necesario continuar invirtiendo con estos préstamos en la compra de ropa de vestir para damas y caballeros, camisas, faltas, blusas y ropa interior, a través de esta inversión podrá continuar ofreciendo a sus clientes mercadería atractiva y con nuevos estilos.

El préstamo anterior le dio un aspecto positivo el negocio, ya que le ha ayudado a mejorar su inventario y a tener mayor variedad en ropa, esto le permite mejorar considerablemente las ventas con sus clientes y al mismo tiempo mejorar su situación familiar.
texts.en:
Verónica has decided on a new loan because her inventory of clothes is shrinking.  She believes it’s necessary to continue investing  the loans in the purchase of clothes for women and men, shirts, skirts, blouses and underwear.  By means of this investment she will be able to continue offering attractive, new styles of clothing to her customers.

Her previous loan produced a positive effect in her business because it helped her to improve her inventory and to have a wider variety of clothes which allowed her to improve sales to her customers considerably while at the same time improving her family situation.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Reina Elizabeth

texts.es:
Reina, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, considera necesaria una nueva inversión en la compra de productos comestibles como el arroz, azúcar, frijoles, estos productos son necesarios para la funcionalidad de negocios, esto le dará mayor seguridad para atender la demanda con sus clientes.

Con el préstamo anterior logró mejorar su inventario, de los cuales ha recibido buenas ganancias, hasta el momento tiene una situación estable con su familia, pues han logrado administrar bien sus fondos y las ventas del negocio.
texts.en:
Reina is opting for a new loan because she considers a new investment in rice, sugar and beans to be necessary; these products are required for her business to function.  This will make her better able to meet customer demand.  

She was able to maintain her inventory with her previous loan and earned good profits.  To date, her situation with her family is stable for they’ve succeeded in managing their funds and sales in the store well.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Noeurn's Group

texts.en:
Noeurn, 56, is one of the breadwinners of the family with two children, one daughter and one son. Her two kids are still living with her and work for others for a fee with a low income. She and her husband earn a living from the two hectares of farmland for growing paddy rice as their only source of income. Having been with this business for thirty-eight years, they can earn about 16,000 KHR per day.  The main challenge for her is the lack of water and the working capital for her current business. This is the second microloan for Noeurn and the first loan for her co-member with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. 

After the first loan was completely paid, she managed to buy an additional plot of land from the revenue received from her crop selling. In the group of two, she is the group leader. Her requested amount is 1,000,000 KHR while her co-member is applying for 500,000 KHR. As for her, she will use her portion to buy fertilizers and to pay for harvesting. Moreover, she is going to buy piglets to raise to make an extra income. She hopes to grow her cash-crops in a timely manner, so she can better support her family with good progress in her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and to pay for harvesting

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is 45 years old, married and has four children who are in school. She works very hard to provide for them. She operates business buying and selling bananas and has been at it 6 years.


Raquel is asking a loan of PHP 10,000 through ASKI to purchase more bananas to sell in the small stores in their place. The more bananas, the more stores she can provide with her product, therefore she could earn more. She hopes that through this loan plus her stability, she can earn more profit for the success of her business as well as their livelihood.

loans.use: to purchase more bananas

loans.name: Morenike Florence

texts.fr: Morenike Florence, âgée de 33 ans, est mariée et mère d'un enfant scolarisé. Spécialisée dans la vente des objets de piété depuis quatre ans, elle s'approvisionne à l'extérieur du Bénin et sa clientèle large et variée est essentiellement composée des religieux. Dans le but de renforcer son capital et de répondre favorablement à la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev en vue d'accroître son stock et de maximiser son intérêt. Le gain dégagé l'aidera à mieux contribuer à la scolarisation de son enfants et à subvenir à ses besoins.
texts.en:
Morenike Florence, aged 33, is married and the mother of a child, who is in school. Specialized in selling objects of devotion for four years, she gets her supplies from outside of Benin. And her large wide and varied customer base is essentially composed of the religious. 

With the goal of bolstering her capital and responding favorably to the demands of her customers, she requested and received a micro-loan from Finadev with the aim of increasing her inventory and making the most of her investments. The profit gotten will help her to cover more of her child's schooling costs and to support herself.

loans.use: to buy 5 boxes of candles, 8 boxes of religious images of various types, and 32 porcelain statuettes

loans.name: Adjowa

texts.fr: Adjowa a 33 ans, elle est mère de deux enfants âgés de 5 et 9 ans et qui vont tous deux à l'école. Son mari exerce la profession de chauffeur. Adjowa est depuis trois ans vendeuse de sel. Elle voudrait augmenter son stock et pouvoir acheter en quantité plus importante ses marchandises. A cette fin, elle sollicite un crédit auprès de Wages. Adjowa a prévu d'épargner les profits qu'elle réalisera dans le but d'assurer les besoins vitaux de sa famille.
texts.en: Adjowa is 33 years old and the mother of two children, five and nine years of age, both of whom are in school. Her husband is a driver by trade. Adjowa has been selling salt for three years. She would like to expand her stock and be able to buy in larger quantities. With this goal, she is seeking a loan from WAGES. Adjowa plans to save her future revenues  for essential family needs.

loans.use: to buy bags of salt.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 48 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su pareja y sus 4 hijos, a quienes ama y son su razón principal en la vida, ella es una persona muy trabajadora, amable y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar desde muy joven para ayuda a sus padres, no pudo terminar sus estudios primarios, por ello su gran sueño es poder culminar sus estudios, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un delicioso Seco de Res para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, día a día Luz trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, todas las mañanas desde tempranas horas ella inicia su labor y dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien porque no tiene competencia cercana y también por la buena atención que brinda a sus clientes. 
Luz se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ella desea poder hacer el cercado de su casa con materiales adecuados, como el ladrillo, cemento, columnas, entre otros; de esta manera Luz espera tener su vivienda en condiciones adecuadas, que aseguren el bienestar y seguridad de sus hijos, así ella seguirá esforzándose y trabajando para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Luz, 48, is a woman living in the city of Nazca with her spouse and four children who she loves very much and are the main reason for life.  She is a very hardworking, kind, enthusiastic person who together with her spouse focuses all efforts to move their family ahead.  Unfortunately, due to the need to go to work from a young age to help her parents, she was unable to complete elementary school which is why her great dream is to complete her schooling.  In her free time she enjoys watching educational television programs and sometimes cooks a delicious “Seco de Res” to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with much effort and enthusiasm, Luz works in her small grocery and soft-drinks store every day.  She starts her work very early every morning and spends about 12 hours daily in her business.  She believes that she does well because she has no nearby competition and also because she provides good customer service.

Luz is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they provide she’ll be able to do some home improvements.  She wants to enclose the house with adequate materials like brick, cement and columns, among others.  In this way, Luz expects to have a house with adequate conditions that will insure her children’s safety and wellbeing.  She  will continue striving and working to move her family forward.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
María es una mujer que le gusta trabajar, es muy responsable en las actividades que realiza. María vive con sus padres y su hijo en Atuntaqui.

María trabaja sola en la crianza de cuyes negocio que en su zona es muy rentable y que le ayuda a mantener su hogar y ayudar con los estudios universitarios a su hijo. María solicitó a Fodemi un crédito el mismo que utilizará para la reconstrucción  deel galpon de cuyes ya que el actual se está quedando pequeño, también usará para la compra de cuyes de raza, inversión que le ayudará a tener más espacio y podrá criar mayor cantidad de cuyes y sus ventas mejorarán.

María sueña en ser una microempresaria con éxito y poder exportar su producción.
texts.en:
María is a woman who likes to work and who is very responsible with the activities she carries out. She lives with her parents and her son in Atuntaqui.

María works alone raising guinea pigs, a business that is very profitable in her area and which helps her to support her household and help with her son's university studies. She requested a loan from Fodemi which she will use to reconstruct the guinea pigs' shed since the current one is too small. She will also use it to purchase pedigree guinea pigs. This investment that will help her have more space and be able to raise a greater quantity of guinea pigs which will improve her sales.

María dreams of being a successful small businesswoman and being able to export her production.

loans.use: to reconstruct the guinea pigs' shed as the current one is too small and also to purchase pedigree guinea pigs.

loans.name: Okila

texts.ru: Окила проживает в городе Исфара. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее муж находится на заработках за рубежом. Окила занимается купле-продажей женской и детской одежды. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 13 лет. Окила просит кредит для приобретения осеней школьной формы.
texts.en: Okila lives in the city of Isfara.  She is 39 years old, married and has two children.  Her husband works abroad.  Okila is involved in buying and selling women's and children's clothing.  She has been in this business for 13 years.  Okila is requesting this loan to purchase autumn school uniforms.

loans.use: to purchase school clothing for the autumn

loans.name: Zurafo

texts.ru: Зурафо 51 года. Она замужем и все ее дети совершеннолетние. Зурафо давно мечтала заняться каким-нибудь видом бизнеса, но раньше у нее не было, ни средств, ни какой либо поддержки.  Она с детства любила  присматриваться за скотом. Зурафо имеет опыт, так как в отцовском доме она помогала родителям присматривать за скотом. Когда она поставила цель начать  свое собственное дело выращиванием скота,  у  неё появилось возможность получить кредит с ООО МЗО «Имон-Интернешнл» и для этого она прошла краткий 3-х дневной курс «Женщина-предприниматель, Добейся Успеха»,  который было организовано Национальной Ассоциации Деловых Женщин, с поддержкой ООО МЗО «Имон-Интернешенл». Она в "Имон-Интернешенл"  обращается впервые с целью получение кредита для покупки скота. Она уверена в себе, что достигнет успеха в бизнесе, потому что она прошла тренинг Женщина-Добейся Успеха. Она ждет вашу помощь.
texts.en: Zurafo is 51 years old, married and all of her children are adults.  She has long been dreaming of getting involved in some type of business, but had neither means nor support before.  She loved looking after livestock since her childhood.  Zurafo has experience because she helped her parents look after livestock in her father's home.  When she set the goal of starting her own business of raising livestock, she got an opportunity to obtain a loan from "Imon-International" and went through a short, three-day course, called "Woman-Entrepreneur, Achieve Success," which was organized by the National Organization for Business Women and with support from "Imon-International."  This is Zurafo's first time requesting a loan from "Imon-International" to purchase livestock.  She is confident that she will achieve success in the business because she completed the Woman-Achieve Success training.  She awaits your help.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en: This is 45-year-old Fatmata. She is married, and has 2 children aged 18 and 15 years.  In 1992, Fatmata established her local foodstuff business. She began her business because of the experience she got from her mother when she was a small girl until she matured and was wedded to her husband, who gave her money to start a business. Working 6 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,500,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. Fatmata requires a loan in order to buy 11 bags of beans @ Le 350,000 and the remaining Le 150,000 for transportation. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 550,000. In the future, Fatmata plans to rent a very big store and to be a leading distributor of local foodstuff. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy 11 bags of beans @ le 350,000 and the remaining Le 150,000 for transportation.

loans.name: Johanna Marisol

texts.es:
Johanna tiene 28 años, se considera una persona muy carismática, honesta, sencilla y que le gusta trabajar mucho. Johanna vive con su hijo en Tulcán que se encuentra en la Provincia del Carchi.

Joanna trabaja sola en la compra venta de ropa como pantalones, blusas, camisetas, interiores y medias. Johanna trabaja en este negocio por tres años y le va muy bien gracias a su carisma y buenos productos, las ganancias que obtiene de este negocio utiliza en los gastos de su hogar y cubrir las necesidades de su hijo. Actualmente Johanna solicitó un crédito a fodemi con el fin de comprar de ropa de niños como pantalones, camisetas, blusas, medias, interiores para que su negocio tenga mayor variedad.

Johanna sueña en mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo dandole buenos estudios, también sueña en tener su propio local para poder vender sus prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Johanna, 28, considers herself to be a very charismatic, honest and unassuming person who very much likes to work.  Johanna lives with her son in Tulcán which is located in Carchi Province.  Johanna works alone buying and selling clothes like pants, blouses, t-shirts, underwear and stockings.  She’s worked in this business for three years and does very well thanks to her charisma and her good products.  Profits she gets from this business are used for household expenses and to cover her son’s needs.  Johanna has asked Fodemi for a loan at present to buy children’s clothes like pants, t-shirts, blouses, socks and underwear in order to have greater variety in her store.  Johanna dreams with improving her son’s quality of life by giving him good schooling.  She also dreams with having her own locale in which to sell her clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Victor Hugo

texts.es:
Hugo vive con su mujer e hijo en Santo Domingo. Tanto Hugo como su esposa Nancy tienen 19 años, y se dedican al negocio de engrampado de escobas, oficio que aprendieron de sus padres. Santo Domingo es una ciudad grande e importante en Ecuador debido a su ubicación geográfica. Al situarse entre la costa y sierra ecuatoriana, Santo Domingo hace de centro principal de comercio y turismo, dos de los factores principales que han impulsado su desarrollo. Sin embargo la principal industria de Santo Domingo no es ni el turismo ni el comercio si no la agricultura. Aparte de esto Santo Domingo también es ampliamente conocido como un centro cultural donde se han integrado mezclado y compartido una variedad de etnias diferentes provenientes de todo el Ecuador e incluso de afuera.
De esta linda ciudad surgen Hugo y Nancy. Hugo trabaja un promedio de 8 horas diarias y considera que la parte más complicada de su trabajo son los viajes que debe realizar constantemente dentro de todo el país para adquirir sus materiales y vender sus escobas. El sueño de Hugo es construir su propia casa para él y su familia, y considera que ha llegado a un punto en su negocio en el que puede invertir más para obtener mejores ingresos. Para alcanzar su sueño Hugo depende en gran medida de este primer crédito con kiva.
texts.en:
Hugo lives with his wife and son in Santo Domingo.  Both Hugo and his wife, Nancy, are 19-years-old and work manufacturing brooms, an occupation they learned from their parents.  

Santo Domingo is a large, important city in Ecuador due to its geographic position.  Being located between the Ecuadorean coast and mountains, it’s a main center of commerce and tourism, two of the main factors that have thrust its development.  However, Santo Domingo’s main industry is neither commerce nor tourism but rather agriculture.  In addition to this, Santo Domingo is widely known as a cultural center where various ethnic groups from all over Ecuador and even from outside have come together and blended.

From this beautiful city Hugo and Nancy arise.  Hugo works on average 8 hours daily and considers the most complicated part of his work to be the trips he must constantly take throughout the country to acquire his supplies and to sell his brooms.   Hugo’s dream is to build his own house for him and his family and considers that his business has arrived at the point where he can invest more in order to earn higher income.  To reach his dream, Hugo depends to a large extent on this first Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make brooms.

loans.name: Zenaida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Zenaida, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio, ya que a través de él logra mantener su familia, los fondos prestados serán para la compra de maíz, leña, gas y cal, pues esto le permitirá poder continuar realizando sus ventas a diario.

Con el préstamo anterior logró tener un efecto positivo ya que le permitió todo lo necesario para continuar realizando su venta, esto le mejoró sus ingresos y al mismo tiempo mejoró su condición familiar.
texts.en:
Zenaida’s asking for a new loan to be able to invest in her business since it’s through it that she’s able to support her family.  The borrowed funds will be used to buy corn, firewood, gas and lime powder because they are what will allow her to continue making her daily sales.
She got a positive result from her previous loan in that it allowed her to have everything necessary to continue selling.  This improved her income while at the same time her family condition improved too.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, gas and lime powder.

loans.name: Donia Margarita

texts.es:
Donía, solicita un nuevo préstamo para continuar invirtiendo en el negocio, pues a través de estos financiamientos ha logrado mantener su granja de cerdos, actualmente comprará nuevos cerdos pequeños para empezar el proceso de engordarlos y luego comercializarlos, lleva varios tiempo de estar en esta actividad y que hasta el momento considera que si obtiene ganancias.

El préstamo anterior le ha permitido a ella permanecer en el negocio, continuar comercializando cerdos y al mismo tiempo sus circunstancias a la familia van mejorando a través de sus ingresos.
texts.en: Donía requests a new loan to continue investing in her business because by means of these loans she’s able to keep her pig farm in operation.  She will buy new piglets to start the fattening up process and then sell them.  She’s been in this activity for a long time and to date considers it to be profitable.  The previous loan allowed her to stay in business and continue selling pigs.  At the same time her family circumstances are improving thanks to her income.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Ana Etelvina

texts.es:
Ana, solicita un nuevo préstamo para poderlo invertir en el negocio, comprandose mercadería nueva en zapatos y chancletas de baño, esto le permitirá a ella poder tener una mejor variedad de mercadería para atender los costos y las necesidades de los clientes.
El préstamo anterior le permitió a Ana crecer en mercadería y ofrecerle a sus clientes un mejor surtido en calzado y tambien invirtio en ropa, esto le permitió mejorar sus condiciones económicas en su familia, ya que logró una mejor estabilidad en las ventas de la mercadería.
texts.en:
Ana requests a new loan to invest in her business.  She will buy new merchandise consisting of shoes and bath slippers.  This will allow her to have a wider variety of merchandise available to meet her customers’ needs and budgets.

Ana’s previous loan allowed her to expand her inventory and offer her customers a wider variety of shoes.  She also bought clothes which led to improved economic conditions for her family in that she attained better stability with her merchandise sales.

loans.use: to buy shoes and bath slippers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 30 T.V. sets @ Le 160,000 and the remaining Le 200,000 for transportation.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To change her husband's rickshaw body so that he can improve his transportation services

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to carry out the construction of her home.

loans.name: Rabi

texts.fr: A 29 ans, Rabi a deux enfants. Le premier ne va pas encore à l'école, il a 1 an, le second a 5 ans et est scolarisé. Le mari de Rabi est vendeur de pièces détachées. Rabi quant à elle, vend dans sa petite boutique des bijoux, des mèches et des chaussures. L'activité de Rabi a commencé il y a 9 ans. Elle entame aujourd'hui son 4ème cycle de prêt. Les investissements que réalise Rabi dans son entreprise lui permettent d'augmenter son stock et de créer une épargne grâce aux bénéfices. Rabi espère pouvoir encore élargir l'activité afin qu'elle puisse assurer les besoins vitaux de sa famille.
texts.en: Rabi, aged 29, has two children. One child is not yet in school and is 1 year old. The other is 5 and is in school. Rabi's husband is a spare parts vendor. As for Rabi, she sells jewelry,hair extensions, and shoes at a small shop. Her business was started nine years ago. She has now begun her fourth loan cycle. The investments that Rabi gets from her enterprise enable her to increase her inventory and to create some savings, thanks to the profits. Rabi hopes to be able expand her business even more, so that she may ensure her family's vital needs are met.

loans.use: to buy jewelry, shoes, and hair extensions

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Joffre Douglas

texts.es:
Joffre reside en Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, ciudad ubicada entre la Sierra y Costa ecuatoriana. Su localización le hace el enlace de carreteras provenientes de varias ciudades importantes tales como Esmeraldas, Cuenca, y Quito. Por lo tanto, es un punto importante para el comercio ecuatoriano, abarca la mayoría del marcado ganadero del país, y se encuentra bastante producción de cacao y otros productos agrícolas. Santo Domingo cuenta un clima tropical húmedo y tiene una temperatura promedio de 18°C a 28°C. La ciudad es el hogar del grupo étnico de los Tsáchilas, indígenas que conservan costumbres tales como vestuario e idioma desde antes de la época colonial. 

Joffre tiene 42 años de edad y vive con su esposa y tres hijos menores de edad. Inició su negocio de venta de mariscos hace 6 años. Aprendió el negocio por unas amistades y desde que empezó trabaja varias horas al día para sacar el negocio adelante. A pesar del esfuerzo, los ingresos no son suficientes para darle una vida más digna a su familia. Por lo tanto, solicita un crédito a Kiva para poder comprar más mariscos, disminuir el costo unitario de los productos, y en consecuencia generar más ganancias. De esta manera, podrá brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos para que tengan la educación secundaria que el no pudo tener y para poder comprarse la finca de sus sueños.
texts.en:
Joffre lives in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, a city located between the mountains and the coast of Ecuador.  Its location makes it a link between the various Ecuadorian highways coming from important cities such as Quito, Cuenca, and Esmeraldas. Therefore, it is an important Ecuadorian commercial center; it is home to most of the country's livestock markets.  Here we find a substantial production of cocoa and other agricultural products.  This city has a humid and temperate climate; the temperature varies between 18 and 28 degrees Centigrade. Santo Domingo is home to the Tsachilas, an ethnic group that maintains traditions, such as in clothing and language, that date back prior to the colonial era.  

Joffre is 42 years old and lives with his wife and their three minor children.  He started a business selling seafood 6 years ago.  He learned this business from some friends, and since he started he has been working several hours per day to make progress with the business.  In spite of his efforts, the income has not been sufficient to provide his family with a decent life.  Therefore, he is requesting a Kiva loan so that he can buy more seafood and reduce the unit costs of his products; this way he can generate better profits.  As a result, he will be able to provide a better future for his children so that they can get the high school education that he could not, and so he can buy the farm that he has been dreaming about.

loans.use: to buy more seafood at a lower unit cost to increase his profits

loans.name: Johana Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Virgen Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar vive la señora Johanna, tiene 31  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 10, 7 y 3 años de edad, los mayores estudian en  escuela. Su esposo chofer y comerciante.

Ella para ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta.   También su esposo vende materiales de pesca a comerciantes del lugar o directamente a pescadores de la zona. Tanto ella como su esposo trabajan todos los días, él con su transporte y venta de materiales de pesca y ella con la venta de ropa, ella deja a crédito a sus clientes y cobra los fines de semana. Lleva más de tres años en esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y materiales para la pesca. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 3 años y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho para su negocio y su vida personal.
 
Su sueño es tener un carro para realizar sus ventas.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Virgen Del Mar (Virgin of the Sea) meets every fortnight in the beautiful resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta, a place famous for its gorgeous beaches visited all over the year by national and international tourists. Most of the residents in this area fish and do chores related to the sea.

Johanna lives here, she is 31 years old, she is married and she has three children aged 10, 7 and 3. He first two children go to school, and her husband is a driver and a retailer.

In order to earn some money of her own and to help her husband paying for their household expenses she engages in selling every kind of clothes, selling them door to door. Her husband sells fishing equipment to retailers of the community or directly to fishermen of the area. Both she and her husband work every day: he transports and sells fishing equipment, and she sells clothes. She sells on credit and collects from her customers during the week-ends. She has been engaged in this activity for more than three years and things are going very well.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy more products such as trousers, blouses, T-shirts and fishing equipment. She has been a member of her Communal Bank for 3 years and she likes it because the loans are a great help both for her activity and for her personal life.

She dreams of owing a vehicle and to use it to sell her products.

loans.use: To buy trousers, blouses, T-shirts and fishing equipment.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Don Miguel tiene 37 años de edad, vive junto a su compañera de vida desde hace 11 años, persona que se dedica al cuidado de sus 4 hijos (dos varones de 10 y 3 años de edad y sus dos hembras de 9 y 7 años respectivamente) y a lavar ropa de sus vecinos por el cual recibe un pago de $2.00 por docena.  Su vivienda es humilde, de 35 metros cuadrados con paredes y techos de láminas de zinc. Actualmente solo tres hijos asisten a la escuela.

Desde su adolescencia Miguel se dedicó a las actividades agrícolas cultivando maíz en áreas de hasta 7,000 metros cuadrados, esta labor la continua desempeñando, con el objetivo que se le inculco que fue brindar seguridad alimentaría a su familia. 

Trabaja desde el 02 de febrero de 2007,  en una zona residencial de carácter privado en la ciudad, donde se desempeña como agente de seguridad, laborando 24 horas, con descansos del mismo tiempo. Este trabajo le permitió generar ingresos constantes para su familia permitiendo que adquiera el terreno donde vive.

De su casa hasta el lugar donde trabaja, existen aproximadamente 20 kilómetros, los que recorre en su bicicleta, esto lo hace considerando que efectúa un ahorro de $1.50 por día lo  que al mes significa $22.50.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación, es para comprar: hierro y cemento para la construcción de horcones, que sirvan de base para su vivienda. Los que posee actualmente son de madera y presentan gran deterioro. Con la inversión mejorará la vivienda, considerando que  al  construir  los horcones o bases de cemento, su casa será más resistente a la adversidad y será de mayor durabilidad, permitiendo que en el futuro inicie la construcción de las paredes con ladrillos o bloques de concreto.

don Miguel tiene el propósito de construir su casa poco a poco, manifiesta que siempre vivió en casa humilde junto a sus padres; pero, desea para sus hijos una vivienda mas segura y de larga duración. Considera que con el  tiempo y el apoyo financiero que recibe irá construyendo su sueño. Con respecto a su familia manifiesta que luchará para que sus hijos estudien hasta ser bachilleres, con el objetivo de que se les facilite obtener un  trabajo diferente al de jornal.
texts.en:
Miguel, 37, has lived with his life companion for the last 11 years.  She is the person who cares for their four children (two boys, 10 and 3, and two girls, 9 and 7 years old respectively) and also takes in laundry for her neighbors for which she’s paid $2.00 per dozen.  His home is humble.  It’s 35 square meters with metal sheeting walls and roof.  Currently only three of his children attend school.

Since he was a teen-ager, Miguel has worked in agriculture growing corn in fields of up to 7,000 square meters.  He continues doing this kind of work with the objective of continuing to provide his family with food.

Since February 2, 2007 he’s been working in a private residential area in the city as a security guard.  He works a 24-hour shift and is off for 24 hours too.  This job allows him to generate constant income for his family which made it possible for him to buy the lot where he lives.  The distance between his house and his place of employment is about 20 kilometers that he covers by bicycle.  He does this considering that he saves $1.50 per day which translates to a monthly saving of $22.50.

The loan he’s requesting from the Fundación is to buy metal and cement to build the roof supports that will be the base of his house.  The ones he has now are wood and are greatly deteriorated.  With this investment he will improve his house because by building the roof supports out of cement the house will be more resistant to adversity and have greater durability allowing him in the future to build brick or concrete block walls.

Miguel aims to build his house little by little.  He states that he always lived in a humble abode with his parents but he wants his children to live in a safer, longer-lasting house.  He thinks that in time and with the financial help he’ll get he will be able to build his dream.  With respect to his family, he states that he will strive so that his children will study through high school with the objective that they will be able to get jobs above day laborers in the future.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy used items and pay for transportation charges

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy water pumps for plumbing business

loans.name: Maria Marcos

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 57 años de edad, soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara junto a una hija.
Doña María se dedica desde hace 9 años a la venta de utensilios doméstico de plástico como ser: vasos, platos, tinas, cestas, cubetas etc. ella vende en su casa y de manera ambulante, de este negocio obtiene los ingresos necesarios para el hogar. El préstamo que está solicitando es para invertirlo en su negocio en la compra de productos plásticos para la venta. Ella quiere incrementar su inventario para extender su mercado en otras aldeas y así poder incrementar las ventas y los ingresos. Su meta es establecer el negocio en un lugar fijo y adquirir un vehículo para distribuir el producto, este negocio será siempre  una fuente de trabajo para ella y su hija.
texts.en: María, 57, is single and has three children; she lives in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara with one of her daughters.  For the last nine years María has been selling plastic domestic utensils like glasses, dishes, tubs, baskets, buckets, etc. at home and from place to place.  She earns income from this business needed for her home.  The loan she’s requesting is to invest in her business buying plastic products to sell.  She wants to increase her inventory to extend her market share into other villages thus increasing sales and income.  He goal is to establish her business in a fixed locale and to acquire a vehicle to distribute her products.  This business will always be her and her daughter’s source of work.

loans.use: to buy plastic items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To repair and for general maintenance of his taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase hairstyling tools, an air conditioner, signage, and to paint her salon

loans.name: Sokem's Group

texts.en:
Sokem, 34, is one of the breadwinners of the family, with two daughters. One of her daughters is still in school and the remaining one is too young for schooling. 

To tackle the family's hardship, Sokem grows paddy rice on four hectares of farmland and her husband works as a motor taxi driver. Together, they can earn about 22,000 Cambodia Riels (KHR) per day.

This is the first loan cycle for Sokem as well as other two members; her group consists of three members and she is the leader. They are seeking 1,000,000 KHR each. Sokem's loan portion will be used to buy fertilizers and rice seed for her farmland. She expects to gain more crop yields so as to make more revenue and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and rice seed for her farmland.

loans.name: Alex

texts.es:
Alex nació en Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, una ciudad ecuatoriana localizada entre la Sierra y Costa ecuatoriana. La ciudad es el enlace de varias ciudades ecuatorianas, por lo tanto Santo Domingo juega un papel importante en el comercio ecuatoriano. La ciudad abarca la mayoría del mercado ganadero del país. Santo Domingo cuenta con un clima húmedo templado con una temperatura promedio de 18°C a 28°C. La ciudad es el hogar de los Tsáchilas, un grupo étnico que mantiene tradiciones tales como vestuario, idioma y costumbres desde antes de la época colonial. 
A sus 33 años de edad, Alex tiene un negocio de manejo de ganado. Tiene algunas vacas y utiliza estos recursos para general ganancias. Él está casado y tiene dos hijos pequeños que actualmente asisten a la escuela. A pesar de que Alex trabaja más de 6 horas todos los días de la semana para sacar adelante sus recursos y poder incrementar sus ingresos, no tiene suficientes vacas para generar más ganancias. Por lo tanto, por medio de Fundación Alternativa, solicita un crédito a Kiva para poder comprarse una vaca más para incrementar su producción y como resultado también sus ingresos. De esta manera les podrá dar una vida más digna a sus hijos y cumplir su sueño de ser dueño de una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Alex was born in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, an Ecuadorian city that is located between the Ecuadorian highlands and coast. The city is a link for several Ecuadorian cities as Santo Domingo plays an important role for Ecuadorian commerce. The city makes up the majority of the livestock market for the country. Santo Domingo has a humid climate with an average temperature between 18°C and 28°C. The city is home to the Tsachilas, an ethnic group that mantains traditions including in their dress, language and customs since before colonial times. 

At 33 years of age, Alex has a business managing livestock. He has some cows and uses this resources for general earnings. He is married and has two small children that currently attend primary school. Despite the fact that Alex works more than 6 hours every day of the week to move his resources forward and increase his earnings, he does not have enough cows to generate greater earnings. As such, through Fundacion Alternativa, he is requesting a loan from Kiva to be able to buy another cow to increase his product and in turn, also increase his earnings. In this way he will be able to give his children a more dignified life and fulfill his dream of being the owner of his own home.

loans.use: in order to buy another cow to increase his production.

loans.name: Iroda

texts.ru: Ирода молодая и незамужняя девушка. Ей 24 года и живет с родителями. Ирода очень трудолюбивая и старательная девушка.  Она с детства мечтала  щит женские и мужские одежды. Когда она поставила цель начать  свое собственное дело, у  неё появилось возможность получить кредит с  ООО МЗО «Имон-Интернешенл» и для этого она прошла краткий 3-х дневной курс «Женщина-предприниматель, Добейся Успеха», который было организовано Национальной Ассоциации Деловых Женщин с поддержкой ООО МЗО «Имон-Интернешенл».   Ирода обращается в «Имон-Интернешенл» повторно с целью получения кредита для покупки основных средств и швейную машинку, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она будет шит одежды и продавать на местном рынке.
texts.en: Iroda is a young and single woman.  She is 24 years old and lives with her parents.  Iroda is a very hardworking and diligent young woman.  She has been dreaming of sewing women's and men's clothing since childhood.  When she set the goal of starting her own business, she got an opportunity to obtain a loan from "Imon-International" and went through a short, three-day course, called "Woman-Entrepreneur, Achieve Success," which was organized by the National Organization for Business Women and with support from "Imon-International."  Iroda is requesting a loan from "Imon-International" again in order to purchase essential means and a sewing machine to start her new business.  She will sew clothing and sell it at a local market.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам 1993 года рождения. В 2012 он поступил в Таджикский Национальный Университет на экономический  факультет по специальности бухгалтерский учет на договорное очное отделение. Сумма договора составляет 5900 сомони. По окончания университета он мечтает стать бухгалтером. До поступления в университет он учился в профессиональном лицее.  Рустам получил среднее образование. По окончанию лицея Рустам получил специальность «система компьютера и интернет технологии». У него имеется аттестат с хорошими оценками. Отец Рустама работает электромонтежником.  Мать работает в Управлении дорожного движения на должности бухгалтера. Его родители не в состоянии оплатить за учебу в университет. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 1250 долларов США для оплаты учебы. Он ждет вашу помощь.
texts.en: Rustam was born in 1993.  He was accepted to the economics department of the Tajikistan State University to study accounting in the paid day division.  The amount of the education contract is 5900 somoni.  Upon graduating from the university, he dreams of becoming an accountant.  Prior to going to the university, he was studying at a professional school.  Rustam obtained a secondary education there and got a speciality of "computer systems and Internet technology."  He has a diploma with good grades.  His parents are unable to pay for his university education.  Rustam is requesting a loan in the amount of $1250 to pay for his education.  He awaits your help.

loans.use: to pay for his university education

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a horse for his loading and transport business.

loans.name: Saron's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from the Kror Kor district of Pursat Province, Saron is a 56-year-old widow and mother of two children. One of her children is still living with her and supporting the family's business of rice farming.

Saron has been engaged in her business for 13 years on two and a half hectares of farmland. To add more income, she also raises two pigs at home. The current business earns her about 11,000 Cambodia Riels (KHR) per day. Saron's group consists of two female members; she is a second-time borrower and the other member is a first-time borrower. Saron has managed the first loan with success to better support both of her businesses and she also completely has paid back the entire loan.

For this cycle, Saron is seeking 500,000 KHR, while the other group member is applying for 1,000,000 KHR. As the group leader, Saron will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to buy pig's feed. She hopes to gain more income from her crop yields and animal husbandry so as to maintain a decent amount of food for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pig feed.

loans.name: Tila Melizza

texts.es:
Tila vive en la maravillosa ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se ubica en la selva peruana y es uno de los lugares más hermosos de nuestro país, ya que encontramos variedad de flora y fauna muy bella y sobre todo podemos apreciar paisajes en los cuales podemos desconectarnos de bullicio de la ciudad y relajarnos mucho. Al lado de Tila vive su pequeño de 5 años de edad, por el cual ella daría la vida con tal de darle una vida digna y sobre todo porque lo ama muchísimo a pesar de pasar momentos difíciles ya que ella es madre soltera y se ha convertido en madre y padre para su pequeño. Cuando Tila tiene un tiempo libre le gusta pasear con su pequeño y también en ocasiones le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Picante”. Debido a sus bajos recursos económicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el cuarto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado computación e informática.

Día a día Tila trabaja en la municipalidad de su distrito como empleada de Limpieza, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día, se levanta muy temprano ya que deja todo listo y ordenado en su hogar para poder ir a su empleo; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo muy honrada.

Tila está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar calaminas y clavos, entre otros para poder realizar refacciones al techo de su vivienda, ya que esa lloviendo mucho y debido a que su techo tiene varios agujeros ingresa mucha agua a la vivienda; de esta manera ella mejorar la calidad de vida de su pequeño y sobre todo ya no se inundara su vivienda y podrá seguir trabajando con muchas ganas para poder realizar su mas grande sueño:” Tener una tiendita de venta de ropa”.
texts.en:
Tila lives in the delightful town of Pucallpa, a city located in the Peruvian jungle with an impressive flora and fauna. It’s a city where one can disconnect from the noise of the city and appreciate the beauty of nature since its scenery is very beautiful. Tila lives with her young son aged 5: she loves him very much, and she would do anything she could to grant him a dignified life, regardless of the difficulties she has to face being a single mother and having to act as mother and father for her son. When Tila has some free time, she likes going for a walk with her son, and at times she also likes eating one of her favorite dishes, the delicious “Picante”. As she is not very rich, she has been able to complete the fourth grade of secondary school only; however, she would have liked studying Computing and Informatics.

Tila works every day as a cleaner in the municipality of her district. She works 8 hours approximately, and she gets up very early to leave everything in order in her house before going to work. She thinks her job is going well because she is a very responsible and above all very honest person.

Tila feels deeply grateful to Kiva Lenders, as thanks to their help she will buy corrugated roofing, nails and other materials to repair the roof of her house. She needs to repairs the holes in her roof from which water has been entering during the recent heavy rains. By repairing the roof she will improve her son’s living conditions as her house will no longer be flooded. She will them be able to keep on working with great determination to make her biggest dream come true: “To open a clothes shop”.

loans.use: To buy corrugated roofing, nails and other materials to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a young horse for a transport business

loans.name: Haydaraly

texts.ru: Хайдарали 26 летний, женатый молодой человек. Он живет в мести со своими родителями. Хайдарали очень хороший семьянин и старается обеспечить семью со всеми удобствами. У него еще нет детей. Его жена домохозяйка, а родители пенсионеры. Хайдарали единственный кормилец в семье. С целью обеспечения семьи 5 лет тому назад он начал свой бизнес услугой такси. У него есть машина марки Мерседес Бенс. В последнее время его машина не в хорошем состоянии и поэтому он хочет отремонтировать ее. Хайдарали не имеет достаточного средства для ремонта машины. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 1800 долларов США. Он ждет вашу доброту. Давайте вместе поможем такому прекрасному человеку!
texts.en: Haydaraly is a 26 year-old, married young man.  He lives together with his parents.  Haydaraly is a very good family man and tries to provide his family with all the comforts.  He does not yet have children.  His wife is a homemaker, and parents are retired.  Haydaraly is the sole provider for the family.  He started his business of providing a taxi service five years ago in order to provide for his family.  He has a Mercedes-Benz car.  Lately, his car has not been in a good condition, and this is why he wants to repair it.  Haydaraly does not have enough means to repair his car.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of $1800.  He awaits your kindness.  Let's help such a beautiful person together!

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a widow and mother of two. She works part time as the local elementary school’s house mother or custodian but is unable to finish each month on her small salary. In order to  earn extra money, Amal began raising sheep and selling their milk. 

She learned from her clientele and mothers from the school that many wanted household supplies but have to travel miles to buy sheets, blankets, and kitchen supplies. Amal decided to start selling household supplies to further increase her income. Now with this new business activity, Amal can finish the month and earn a living with dignity.

Amal needs this loan to assist with paying for renovations in an area of her home for her home store and to purchase stock.

Amal wants to continue and earn with dignity and she is working on learning to read and write.

loans.use: to pay for renovations in an area of her home for her home store and to purchase stock.

loans.name: Evangelista

texts.en:
Evangelista is a 44-year-old woman who hopes to see her wood-crafting business prosper in the coming years. In her business she works with her husband Amante. They are helping each other to improve their lives. 

Now she is requesting additional capital in the amount of PHP 7,000 to buy wood and other material needed in designing their products. Hopefully, her requested loan will be funded.

loans.use: to buy wood and other material needed for a wood-crafting business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy scrap for her husband's scrap business

loans.name: Maryjane

texts.en: Maryjane is a 27-year-old married woman with two children. She has been managing her grocery store for seven years. She sells a variety of goods in her store such as beverages, soft drinks, canned goods and noodles. She would like to increase the stock of her goods and the variety of groceries in her business in order to attract more consumers. She is requesting additional capital amounting to PHP 25,000 to purchase canned biscuits, ice cream, chips and sweets. This amount would be useful in improving her business. She hopes that her wish loan will be approved.

loans.use: to purchase canned biscuits, ice cream, chips and sweets

loans.name: Fotso

texts.fr: Fotso un homme de 31 ans marié sans enfants, mais ayant une personne à sa charge. Il a ouvert une ferme dans laquelle il élève les poulets dans un quartier de la place depuis 2 ans. Elle évolue avec le temps grace à son savoir faire. Fotso a agrandi sa clientèle en peu temps grace aux prix pratiqués et surtout à la qualité de ses poulets, ce qui lui cause les ruptures permanentes de stocks dues à l'augmentation considérable de la demande. Ce qui l'emmène à solliciter ce crédit qui lui permettra d'augmenter sa production, ses ventes et aussi ses bénéfices.Mais aussi satisfaire sa clientèle. Il réinvestira tout son bénéfice dans son activité pour l'étendre.
texts.en: Fotso is a 31-year old married man who has no children, but does have one dependant. Two years ago he opened a farm in one of the town's districts and he raises chickens here. The farm is developing as time goes on due to his know-how. Fotso has built up his customer base quickly due to his prices and above all the quality of his chickens; the significant increase in demand has led to continuous ruptures of stock and led to Fotso requesting this loan, which will enable him to  increase his production, sales and profits. He will also be able to satisfy customer demand. He is going to reinvest all his profits in his business in order to expand it.

loans.use: to buy baskets of chickens

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn runs a sari-sari store in the village of Lasam and has requested a PHP 7,000 loan to buy stocks of groceries, such as canned goods, soy sauce, breads and candies to sell in her store.

She has been in this business for three years, and she is thankful for the gradual improvement of their modest standard of living.  

In the future, Jovelyn would like to save enough to improve her business as well as their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy stocks of groceries such as canned goods, soy sauce, breads and candies

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a mother of three children. She is 32 years old and has been operating her business for ten years. She was not able to get a good job because she has little education. That is why she runs a fruit and vegetable business. 

She needs to earn more money to provide a good education for her children. However, Marilyn has insufficient funds to purchase the produce that is now in heavy demand and very profitable. This led her to request a loan of PHP 35,000 to purchase dragon fruit, chico, cabbage and pechay. These additional items would help increase her sales so she can save for the good future of her three children.

loans.use: to purchase produce that is in heavy demand now, such as dragon fruit, chico, cabbage and pechay.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
Loida is 42 years old and lives in Gonzaga. She is married and has three children. Loida has been operating a wholesale business for almost 13 years and is able to earn about PHP 10,000 a month because her allotted place is in their public market. She sells products such as Tupperware brands, Splash and AVON. With her charismatic and friendly character, she’s able to attract customers. For that reason, she is earning a profit to cover the needs of her family.

She wants to stock more products in her store. This causes her to request an additional loan from ASKI for 20,000 PHP to purchase the orders of her loyal customers for items such as lotion, bras, lipsticks, face powder, plastic plates and glass. She is hoping that through her business, she can save some funds for the studies of her three children.

loans.use: to purchase her loyal customers' orders for lotion, bras, lipsticks, face powder, plastic plates and glasses

loans.name: Huong

texts.en: Huong would like to take an additional loan to buy new furniture and food such as sugar and milk to stock her stall. Huong's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy new furniture and food to sell from her food stall.

loans.name: Duyen

texts.en: Duyen would like to take an additional loan to repair her stall and buy new furniture. Duyen's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers, and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to repair her stall and buy new furniture

loans.name: Narcisa Del Jesús

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Progreso Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.

En este lugar vive la señora Narcisa, tiene 49 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
 
Ella hace varios años aprendió corte y confección en una academia en la localidad y hoy tiene un pequeño taller de costura en su casa, confecciona todo tipo de ropa pero   lo que más le gusta elaborar es ropa de mujer o de niñas, en temporadas de entrada a clases ella también  confecciona uniformes, todo lo que elabora es bajo pedidos  que le realizan sus clientes y a veces también ciertos bazares de Manta le piden que les elabora prendas más que todo de niños para luego ellos venderlos en sus locales, lleva más de 10 años con su taller y casi nunca le falta el trabajo.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que el otro le fue de mucha utilidad porque necesitaba de urgencia el dinero para comprar los materiales para confeccionar los uniformes, con esto también obtuvo muy buenos ingresos que le sirvieron de mucho ya que su esposo estaba enfermo y ella pudo utilizar estas ganancias para médicos y medicinas, ahora él está mejor y si no hubiese sido por sus ganancias no hubiesen tenido como solventar estos gastos. Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas, hilos, botones  y otros materiales para la costura. Esta desde el inicio en el banco comunal y le gusta todo del banco.

Su sueño es tener muy buena salud.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Progreso Del Mar" meets every 15 days in the beautiful resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited a lot during all times of the year by national and foreign tourists. In this place the majority of the people make a living fishing and in other sea related trades. 

Here Nacisa lives, whom is 49 years old. She is married and from this relationship she has three children who are already of older and independent. Her husband is a fisherman. 

Several years ago she learned the dress making trade in a local academy. She now has a small sewing shop in her house. She makes all types of clothing but what she likes to make the most is women and girls' clothing. During the back to school season she also makes uniforms. Everything that she makes is by orders that her customers make to her and sometimes certain shops in Manta request that she make garments, especially children's clothing, so that they can sell them in their shops. She has had her shop for ten years and she is almost never lacking work. 

She is requesting another loan since the other was very useful for her because she urgently needed money to buy materials to make school uniforms. With this she also obtained good earnings that served her well since her husband had been sick and she could use these earnings for the doctor and medicine. Now he is better and if it had not been for her earnings she would not have covered these expenses. This new loan is to be used to buy fabrics, thread, buttons and other sewing materials. She has been with the communal bank since its beginning and she likes everything about the bank. 

Her dream is to be in very good health.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, buttons, and other materials for sewing.

loans.name: Sothea

texts.en:
Sothea lives in a wooden house with her husband and one dependent daughter who is a student, in a rural village of the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province. Sothea is 29 years old and earns a living with her husband as rice farmers. In addition to her farmland, she leases a plot of farmland to increase her farming activity. She has been in this business for five years, earning about 16,700 KHR per day to meet basic family's needs and she is able to save about 6,700 KHR each day for the future. 

This is the first loan for Sothea with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. Now requesting a loan of 1,800,000 KHR, she is going to use this loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland and cassava seedlings to plant as an additional source of income. This loan will enable her family to have another source of income and she hopes to increase her family's earning in order to set aside some money to buy a plot of land to extend her farmland and to build a decent house to live in.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is a farmer in Nyamira. She is married and has three adult children. She has been in farming for 25 consecutive years and currently produces and sells sugarcane, milk, maize, bananas, sorghum, and tea to the local markets. She also operates a retail shop to generate more income.

Hellen has made a loan request amounting to 40,000 KES, which she will use to construct a dairy unit for her cows. She hopes her income will enable her to provide better living standards to her children, as well as to provide for herself especially in her old-age.

However, she notes the challenges occasioned by unstable weather conditions.

loans.use: To construct a dairy unit

loans.name: Kaai's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house with her husband and one dependent daughter in Kampong Cham province's Memot district, Kaai is 22 years old. To make a living, she and her husband have been planting cassava for about two years. The current business earns her about 33,000 KHR per day to pay for daily expenses. She manages to save about 20,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

Kaai's group consists of four members who live in the same village. Kaai is taking her third loan with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. She has successfully used the prior loans to increase her family's business by leasing a plot of farmland and to improve their livelihood. Now she is leading the other three members to apply for a micro loan. She is going to use her portion to buy rubber seedlings to plant as an additional business and pay for labor. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her family's income to improve her family's living condition.

loans.use: To buy rubber seedlings to plant

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Me Mot district

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
